markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Morlock](/Traits.aspx?ID=302)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 309 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

Morlocks are a family of pale, underground-dwelling humanoids who, generations ago, were regular humans.
